overview:
Doug Chambers is the CEO and co-founder of FieldLens™. The FieldLens™ mobile application is designed for mobile field management within the construction industry.

After more than a decade frustrated by the construction industry’s inefficient methods of communication, Chambers recognized that the rise of smartphones, tablets, and cloud computing technologies could help make the construction industry safer and more efficient by allowing for remote and realtime access to all field management issues. FieldLens™ was founded in 2011, and will be available for open beta in early 2013.

Prior to founding FieldLens™, Chambers was a Senior Project Manager for Tishman Construction, where he managed construction for World Trade Center, Tower 4. Previously the Assistent Vice President of AMEC SPIE, Chambers managed construction for the New York Times building in New York City.

degrees.subject: Operations Management
degrees.institution: DePaul University - Charles H. Kellstadt Graduate School of Business
